article_title: Bradley Cooper Tells Howard Stern He Set Up 'Between Two Ferns' Obamacare Show

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: VideoActor Bradley Cooper told Howard Stern today that he facilitated President Obama's appearance last year on his pal Zach Galifianakis' “Between Two Ferns,” web series to promote the Affordable Care Act to young people. The popular show on the web site "Funny or Die" was credited by the White House and others as a [...]
